citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, the Program of Veterinary Care and contingency plan were not available for review by the
inspector. The review of records required by the Animal Welfare Act facilitates the inspection process by allowing the
inspector to determine compliance and evaluate animal welfare. The facility must ensure that all records are available
upon request during the inspection process. Correction date: June 22,2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n
